# CAM::SET_GAMEPLAY_HINT_FOV

## Summary
Sets the field of view (fov) value in degrees

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** fov: Valid between 1.0f and 130.0f

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Call at the start of the hint to avoid pops
